meanings.definition: The study of flags and their symbolism.
meanings.sent1: In vexillologies, experts analyze the meaning behind different flags.
meanings.sent2: Vexillologies involves researching the history and significance of various flags.
meanings.sent3: The vexillologies class had a fun project where they created their own flag designs.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of vexillologies allowed her to see the world through a flag-colored lens.
meanings.sent5: The book on vexillologies painted a vivid picture of flag traditions around the globe.

meanings.sent1: Students in the vexillologies workshop learned how to create unique flag designs.
meanings.sent2: Vexillologies requires creativity and attention to detail when crafting flags.
meanings.sent3: The vexillologies club hosted a contest to see who could come up with the most creative flag.
meanings.sent4: His passion for vexillologies inspired him to design a flag that represented unity and peace.
meanings.sent5: The art of vexillologies transforms simple pieces of cloth into powerful symbols of identity.
